walk.notes: Floating hands bob up/middle/down/middle - flame doesn't walk, it hovers

frame_descriptions.0: idle - flame body with cyclops eye (white with black pupil), symmetric floating hands at middle height
frame_descriptions.2: walk2 - floating hands at MIDDLE (same as idle)
frame_descriptions.4: walk4 - floating hands at MIDDLE (for smooth loop)
frame_descriptions.5: death1 - hit reaction, eye squints/closes to a line, flame flickers erratically, hands fly outward
frame_descriptions.6: death2 - flame bursts apart, eye cracked, core dispersing into embers, scattered pieces
frame_descriptions.7: death3 - ash pile with glowing embers, smoke wisps, cracked eye piece visible in ash

visual_features.body: Teardrop flame shape, pointed at top, wide in middle
visual_features.color_gradient: Dark red at tips → orange → yellow → white-hot core at bottom
visual_features.eye: Large cyclops eye in center, white with black pupil
visual_features.hands: Two symmetric floating flame-hands, same color gradient as body
visual_features.death_type: Burns out into ash pile with embers (no blood - it's fire)
